env HOME=$WORK/home

gunk format .
cmp message.gunk message.gunk.golden

! gunk format ./error
stderr 'error/message.gunk:4:11: struct field tag for pb was empty, please remove or add sequence number'

-- go.mod --
module testdata.tld/message
-- error/message.gunk --
package message

type Message struct {
	Code int `pb:""` // Currently we are unable to handle the case where pb is empty
}
-- message.gunk --
package message

type EmptyMessage struct {}

type MessageNoTags struct {
	Text string
	Code int
}

type MessageSomeTags struct {
	Text string `json:"text"`
	Code int `pb:"2"`
	URL string
	Error bool `pb:"4"`
}

type MessageAllTags struct {
	Text string `pb:"1" json:"text"`
	Code int `pb:"2"`
	URL string `pb:"3"`
	Error bool `pb:"4"`
}
-- message.gunk.golden --
package message

type EmptyMessage struct{}

type MessageNoTags struct {
	Text string `pb:"1"`
	Code int    `pb:"2"`
}

type MessageSomeTags struct {
	Text  string `pb:"1" json:"text"`
	Code  int    `pb:"2"`
	URL   string `pb:"3"`
	Error bool   `pb:"4"`
}

type MessageAllTags struct {
	Text  string `pb:"1" json:"text"`
	Code  int    `pb:"2"`
	URL   string `pb:"3"`
	Error bool   `pb:"4"`
}
